GK19ksbhm07u:2: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_7.1 //
GK19ksbhm07u:8: abdhau bhagne pravahaṇe vaṇijaḥ patitā iva // Bhmj_7.4 //
GK19ksbhm07u:12: karṇasyānumate cakre droṇaṃ senāsu nāyakam // Bhmj_7.6 //
GK19ksbhm07u:14: sa babhau śaktimānvīro mahāsena ivāparaḥ // Bhmj_7.7 //
GK19ksbhm07u:24: śauryoṣmaṇā pratigataḥ pratāpa iva piṇḍitaḥ // Bhmj_7.12 //
GK19ksbhm07u:26: dadau varaṃ śriyā juṣṭaḥ sa rājñā svayamarthitaḥ // Bhmj_7.13 //
GK19ksbhm07u:44: śalyaṃ ca virathaṃ vīro vidadhe balināṃ varam // Bhmj_7.22 //
GK19ksbhm07u:52: tau dṛṣṭvā patitau vīrāḥ saṃnipetuḥ prahāriṇaḥ // Bhmj_7.26 //
GK19ksbhm07u:66: kolāhalaṃ svasainyānāṃ tūrṇaṃ taṃ deśamāyayau // Bhmj_7.33 //
GK19ksbhm07u:75: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ grahīṣyāmi durjayo hi dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_7.37 //
GK19ksbhm07u:90: ayaṃ te satyajidvīraḥ pāñcālyaḥ pravaro rathaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:97: dadhmau dhanaṃjayaḥ śaṅkhaṃ kandaṃ nijayaśastaroḥ // Bhmj_7.48 //
GK19ksbhm07u:115: tataḥ pravṛtte saṃgrāme kṣaye caiva mahībhujām /
GK19ksbhm07u:117: rajobhiḥ pihite vyomni dikṣu ruddhāsu sāyakaiḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:123: yudhyamānaṃ tato hatvā vṛkaṃ rājasutaṃ guruḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:124: śaraiḥ satyajitaṃ cakre kīrṇāṃśumiva bhāskaram // Bhmj_7.61 //
GK19ksbhm07u:133: dṛḍhasenaṃ kṣatradevaṃ vasudānaṃ ca pārthivam // Bhmj_7.65 //
GK19ksbhm07u:144: dantaprabhaiḥ kṛṣṇavālaiḥ svayaṃ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // Bhmj_7.70 //
GK19ksbhm07u:146: parivārya raṇe droṇaṃ cakrurbāṇamayaṃ jagat // Bhmj_7.71 //
GK19ksbhm07u:155: kṛtabāhau subāhau ca hate vīre yuyutsunā /
GK19ksbhm07u:174: gatvā pade pade paśyansasmāra kamalākarān // Bhmj_7.85 //
GK19ksbhm07u:175: sa vāhinīṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ praviśya nibiḍaṃ gajaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:182: ākṛṣṭaṃ pāśahastena yena taṃ menire janāḥ // Bhmj_7.89 //
GK19ksbhm07u:183: saṃśaye patitaṃ bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:190: janatā kṛnṛpeṇeva na lebhe śaraṇaṃ kvacit // Bhmj_7.93 //
GK19ksbhm07u:210: gṛhītaṃ tanmayā divyaṃ jahyenamadhunā nṛpam // Bhmj_7.103 //
GK19ksbhm07u:218: jaghāna mahītaṃ senāṃ patitāḥ pātayanti yat // Bhmj_7.107 //
GK19ksbhm07u:236: na lebhe śaraṇaṃ trāsādvidrutā kuruvāhinī // Bhmj_7.115 //
GK19ksbhm07u:241: tūrṇaṃ praharata droṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rakṣata saṃgare /
GK19ksbhm07u:242: pāṇḍavānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca babhūveti mahādhvaniḥ // Bhmj_7.118 //
GK19ksbhm07u:248: chattraṃ dhvajaṃ kārmukaṃ ca bhallaiściccheda nirvyathaḥ // Bhmj_7.121 //
GK19ksbhm07u:250: kṛpāṇena śiro hartuṃ drauṇeḥ śyena ivāpatat // Bhmj_7.122 //
GK19ksbhm07u:261: bhinnāṃ kurucamūṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ pārthamayodhayat // Bhmj_7.127 //
GK19ksbhm07u:266: śatruṃjayaṃ vipāṭaṃ ca vīraṃ cāvarajaṃ śaraiḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:279: vīro niṣphalatāṃ yāto dharmajagrahaṇe mama // Bhmj_7.135 //
GK19ksbhm07u:281: vṛthā manorathaṃ kartuṃ śikṣitā na bhavadvidhāḥ // Bhmj_7.136 //
GK19ksbhm07u:305: eṣa vyūhaṃ vidāryādya praviśāmi tvadājñayā // Bhmj_7.148 //
GK19ksbhm07u:309: sa muktaśaiśvo vīraḥ kesarīva trihāyanaḥ // Bhmj_7.150 //
GK19ksbhm07u:315: tataḥ pravṛtte samare mahatāmapi mohane // Bhmj_7.153 //
GK19ksbhm07u:318: dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaṃ taṃ sarve kuruvīrāḥ samādravan /
GK19ksbhm07u:319: ayaṃ gṛhīto yāto 'yaṃ hato 'yaṃ hantyayaṃ bahūn // Bhmj_7.155 //
GK19ksbhm07u:325: vadhyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā saubhadreṇa prahāriṇā // Bhmj_7.158 //
GK19ksbhm07u:329: bhagne tato kurubale droṇakarṇakṛpāḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_7.160 //
GK19ksbhm07u:337: madrarājānujaṃ hatvā sa tūrṇaṃ bhīmavikramam // Bhmj_7.164 //
GK19ksbhm07u:339: krameṇaikaikaśo jitvā saṃhatāṃśca punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_7.165 //
GK19ksbhm07u:350: varaṃ tapaḥ kṛśo lebhe tajjayaṃ phalgumaṃ vinā /
GK19ksbhm07u:353: haimaṃ varāhaṃ bibhrāṇo dhvaje vaiśvānaraprabham // Bhmj_7.172 //
GK19ksbhm07u:357: vṛṣasenaṃ sa vidrāvya vīro vaikartanātmajam // Bhmj_7.174 //
GK19ksbhm07u:359: tasminvimarde tumule dikṣu ruddhāsu pāṃsubhiḥ // Bhmj_7.175 //
GK19ksbhm07u:369: vidrute bhūbhujāṃ cakre bhagnāmānaḥ suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_7.180 //
GK19ksbhm07u:377: kauravendrastataḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite // Bhmj_7.184 //
GK19ksbhm07u:387: dauḥśāsaniṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pṛṣatkena parāṅbhukham // Bhmj_7.189 //
GK19ksbhm07u:395: sa babhau bimbito rājñāṃ svaṅgeṣu kavaceṣu ca // Bhmj_7.193 //
GK19ksbhm07u:405: asya dhairyamamaryādaṃ dṛṣṭvā prauḍhaṃ ca vikramam // Bhmj_7.198 //
GK19ksbhm07u:406: romāñjakañcukaḥ kāyaḥ kasya nāma na jāyate /
GK19ksbhm07u:411: tato droṇaḥ samābhāṣya karṇena sahito yayau // Bhmj_7.201 //
GK19ksbhm07u:416: rathaṃ jaghāna hārdikyaḥ sārathiṃ tasya gautamaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:421: patitaṃ menire mūrdhni tulyaṃ sarve mahārathāḥ // Bhmj_7.206 //
GK19ksbhm07u:425: sa cakre rājacakrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ cakrāyudhabhramam // Bhmj_7.208 //
GK19ksbhm07u:429: subalasyātmajaṃ vīraṃ kālikeyaṃ jaghāna saḥ // Bhmj_7.210 //
GK19ksbhm07u:434: rathaṃ dauḥśāsaneḥ sāśvaṃ sa niṣpiṣya sasārathim /
GK19ksbhm07u:457: samāyayau tato jiṣṇuḥ śibiraṃ vimanā iva /
GK19ksbhm07u:458: prāyaḥ pūrvaṃ manāṃsyeva kathayanti śubhāśubham // Bhmj_7.224 //
GK19ksbhm07u:464: praviṣṭo nidhanaṃ nītaḥ kurubhiḥ kūṭayodhibhiḥ // Bhmj_7.227 //
GK19ksbhm07u:465: praveśaṃ śikṣito vyūhe mayā bālo na nirgamam /
GK19ksbhm07u:466: dhruvaṃ sa nihataḥ pāpaurvīro rājīvalocanaḥ // Bhmj_7.228 //
GK19ksbhm07u:469: yaśomayīṃ praviṣṭo 'sau vīraḥ kalpasthirāṃ tanum // Bhmj_7.229 //
GK19ksbhm07u:475: vyaktaṃ ripubhirākīrṇaḥ patansasmāra māṃ sutaḥ // Bhmj_7.232 //
GK19ksbhm07u:476: svasrīyaḥ keśava tvāṃ vā luptadhairyo 'thavā na saḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:479: manye taṃ manyate kāntaṃ tārāpatinibhānanam // Bhmj_7.234 //
GK19ksbhm07u:481: pariṣvajasva hā putra kva yāto 'si vihāya mām // Bhmj_7.235 //
GK19ksbhm07u:483: pratilabhya punaḥ saṃjñāṃ śrutvā hetuṃ jayadratham // Bhmj_7.236 //
GK19ksbhm07u:485: hantāhaṃ saindhavaṃ pāpaṃ tridaśairapi rakṣitam // Bhmj_7.237 //
GK19ksbhm07u:487: ye caranti gurudrohaṃ sādhūnparivadanti ye // Bhmj_7.238 //
GK19ksbhm07u:488: viśvastānghnanti ye svairaṃ nikṣepaṃ bhakṣayanti ye /
GK19ksbhm07u:489: nindanti ye striyaṃ bhuktvā ye ca śāstrārthavarjitāḥ // Bhmj_7.239 //
GK19ksbhm07u:490: ācaranti niṣiddhaṃ ye vihitaṃ ca tyajanti ye /
GK19ksbhm07u:491: lokanvrajeyaṃ tattulyānhanyā yadi na taṃ yudhi // Bhmj_7.240 //
GK19ksbhm07u:495: api sthitaṃ taṃ madbāṇā dārayiṣyantyavāritāḥ // Bhmj_7.242 //
GK19ksbhm07u:497: dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahī yena cakampe sakulācalā // Bhmj_7.243 //
GK19ksbhm07u:504: gacchāmi pārthivāḥ sarve māṃ vā rakṣantu saṃhatāḥ // Bhmj_7.246 //
GK19ksbhm07u:506: śvaḥ kartāsmi mahāvyūhaṃ durbhedyaṃ tridaśairapi // Bhmj_7.247 //
GK19ksbhm07u:514: subhadrāṃ yājñasenīṃ ca śauriḥ sāntvayituṃ yayau // Bhmj_7.251 //
GK19ksbhm07u:516: vilalāpa muhuḥ kaṇṭhe snuṣāmālambya mūrcchitām // Bhmj_7.252 //
GK19ksbhm07u:518: kva nu te padmapattrākṣaṃ drakṣyāmi vadanaṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_7.253 //
GK19ksbhm07u:519: iyaṃ te matsyaduhitā navoḍhā mahiṣī priyā /
GK19ksbhm07u:521: nāthe pitari kṛṣṇe ca bhīme ca balināṃ vare /
GK19ksbhm07u:528: pavitre śayane nidrāṃ lebhe śakrasutastataḥ // Bhmj_7.258 //
GK19ksbhm07u:532: bhaktyā tuṣṭāva varadaṃ vareṇyaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ // Bhmj_7.260 //
GK19ksbhm07u:536: namaḥ śivāya bhīmāya śrīkaṇṭhāya kapāline // Bhmj_7.262 //
GK19ksbhm07u:544: manttraṃ ca prāpya caṇḍīśātkṛtakṛtyo vyabudhyata // Bhmj_7.266 //
GK19ksbhm07u:554: jayadrathaṃ vṛtaṃ vīraiḥ sūcīpāśe nyavedayat // Bhmj_7.271 //
GK19ksbhm07u:558: sehire na mahīpālā draṣṭuṃ tejo mahaujasaḥ // Bhmj_7.273 //
GK19ksbhm07u:560: śvetāśve syandane kṛṣṇau śubhrau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ // Bhmj_7.274 //
GK19ksbhm07u:567: sa praṇamya guruṃ vṛddhamanumānya prasādya ca /
GK19ksbhm07u:577: vṛto gato hato labdho hantyeṣa patitā vayam /
GK19ksbhm07u:578: ityabhūddārumaḥ śabdo yatra yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_7.283 //
GK19ksbhm07u:581: ajayyaṃ samare droṇaṃ tyaktvā dhīmati phalguṇe /
GK19ksbhm07u:586: rundhānaḥ samare cakre jvālājālajaṭaṃ nabhaḥ // Bhmj_7.287 //
GK19ksbhm07u:590: abhyudyayau vāripateḥ suto rājā śrutāyudhaḥ // Bhmj_7.289 //
GK19ksbhm07u:592: rathaṃ hatvāsya vidadhe pārthaḥ sarvāyudhakṣayam // Bhmj_7.290 //
GK19ksbhm07u:593: varuṇena purā pitrā sa dattāmādade gadām /
GK19ksbhm07u:594: ayodhe pātitā mohāttamevaitya nihanti yā // Bhmj_7.291 //
GK19ksbhm07u:595: sa tayā keśavaṃ mūḍho mṛtyudūtyeva ghorayā /
GK19ksbhm07u:616: sāśvasūtau supatrau ca kathāśeṣau cakāra tau // Bhmj_7.301 //
GK19ksbhm07u:625: ācārya paśya pārthena bhūbhujāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtam // Bhmj_7.305 //
GK19ksbhm07u:627: śiṣyānurodho yadi te na syātsaralacetasaḥ // Bhmj_7.306 //
GK19ksbhm07u:631: carantaṃ mama sainyeṣu sāmānyo vārayiṣyati // Bhmj_7.308 //
GK19ksbhm07u:633: tārkṣyavego yuvā pārtho vṛddhamullaṅghya cāgataḥ // Bhmj_7.309 //
GK19ksbhm07u:635: praviśantyeṣa bībhātsuṃ vrajāmi yadi pṛṣṭhataḥ // Bhmj_7.310 //
GK19ksbhm07u:636: idaṃ tu te karomyadya hitaṃ lokeṣu duṣkaram /
GK19ksbhm07u:637: bhaviṣyasi raṇe yena devānāmapi durjayaḥ // Bhmj_7.311 //
GK19ksbhm07u:638: ghore vṛtraraṇe rudraḥ surendrāya dadau purā /
GK19ksbhm07u:639: divyaṃ mantramayaṃ varma durbhedyo yena so 'bhavat // Bhmj_7.312 //
GK19ksbhm07u:654: bāhlikaṃ śakuniṃ droṇiṃ vṛṣasenaṃ ca gautamam /
GK19ksbhm07u:663: krośadvayaṃ yayāvagre sa kṛṣṇaprerito rathaḥ // Bhmj_7.324 //
GK19ksbhm07u:670: tayoḥ pārtho rathau hatvā chitvā ca dhanuṣī śaraiḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:693: ayaṃ sa kartā darpāndho nikārāṇāṃ sthavīyasām /
GK19ksbhm07u:702: jñātaṃ kṛṣṇa mayā yena pāpo 'yaṃ pratibhāṃ śritaḥ // Bhmj_7.343 //
GK19ksbhm07u:718: ciccheda bāṇairmarmāṇi chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // Bhmj_7.351 //
GK19ksbhm07u:727: hatāśvaṃ kṛttacāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sarve yudhiṣṭhiram /
GK19ksbhm07u:728: hṛto hṛto nṛpa iti sphāratāraṃ pracukruśuḥ // Bhmj_7.356 //
GK19ksbhm07u:730: brahmastreṇa ca tāṃ droṇo bhasmasādakarotkṣaṇāt // Bhmj_7.357 //
GK19ksbhm07u:732: saha devarathenāśu muktvā droṇaṃ yayau nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_7.358 //
GK19ksbhm07u:738: vidhāya cchinnamūrdhānaṃ kabandhaṃ vidadhe kṣaṇam // Bhmj_7.361 //
GK19ksbhm07u:757: uvāca sātyakiṃ matvā sa dhuryaṃ sarvadhanvinām // Bhmj_7.370 //
GK19ksbhm07u:758: sātyake paśya bandhūnāṃ gurūṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā /
GK19ksbhm07u:760: sa te guruḥ sakhā bandhuḥ kirīṭi śatrumadhyagaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:761: na jñāyate praṇaṣṭe 'tra śaṅkhaśabde kathaṃ sthitaḥ // Bhmj_7.372 //
GK19ksbhm07u:765: mittrārthe tyajatāṃ prāṇānsamānaṃ śrūyate phalam // Bhmj_7.374 //
GK19ksbhm07u:766: dhanyā bhavadvidhā eva kriyate yaiḥ sthiraṃ yaśaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:769: bhīmapārṣataguptasya satyaṃ me na bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_7.376 //
GK19ksbhm07u:775: bhīme rakṣāṃ nidhāyāsya maṅgalālaṃkṛto yayau // Bhmj_7.379 //
GK19ksbhm07u:781: guro śiṣyaṃ tavānveṣṭuṃ phalguṇaṃ prasthitasya me /
GK19ksbhm07u:784: na praveṣṭuṃ tvayā śakyaṃ mayi jīvati sātyake // Bhmj_7.383 //
GK19ksbhm07u:786: rathena vañcayitvā taṃ parāhūtaṃ samāviśat // Bhmj_7.384 //
GK19ksbhm07u:798: chitvā bhujau jahārāśu saratnamukuṭaṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_7.390 //
GK19ksbhm07u:811: vihāya samaraṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāradvājāntikaṃ yayau // Bhmj_7.396 //
GK19ksbhm07u:812: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vihvalaṃ droṇo babhāṣe pārśvartinam /
GK19ksbhm07u:813: ko 'yaṃ te saṃbhramo vīra gatvā rakṣa yajadratham // Bhmj_7.397 //
GK19ksbhm07u:815: kṛtavairaśca mānī ca yoddhavye vidruto 'si kim // Bhmj_7.398 //
GK19ksbhm07u:817: ato bahuguṇaṃ vīrau bhīmapārthau kariṣyataḥ // Bhmj_7.399 //
GK19ksbhm07u:818: naiṣā sabhā sā pāñcālī yatra tvaṃ kṛṣṭavānasi /
GK19ksbhm07u:821: antaṃ na yātā vīrāṇāṃ saṃpratyarjunasāyakāḥ // Bhmj_7.401 //
GK19ksbhm07u:844: tasya tūrṇaṃ śitairbāṇairguruḥ kṛtvā yudhi kṣayam /
GK19ksbhm07u:856: yathā na śrūyate bhīma śaṅkhaśabdaḥ kirīṭinaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:857: tathā manye kimapyasya kṛtaṃ sarvairmahārathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.418 //
GK19ksbhm07u:859: vinā tavānujaṃ bhīma kathaṃ jīvitumutsahe // Bhmj_7.419 //
GK19ksbhm07u:865: rājandhanaṃjaye śaṅkāṃ na mithyā kartumarhasi // Bhmj_7.422 //
GK19ksbhm07u:867: pragalbhate dhuraṃ dhatte yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ // Bhmj_7.423 //
GK19ksbhm07u:875: māmanirjitya kaunteya bhettuṃ śakyā na vāhinī // Bhmj_7.427 //
GK19ksbhm07u:876: tvadvidhaiḥ kururājasya saṃrambhaṃ mā kṛthā vṛthā /
GK19ksbhm07u:879: yathā tvaṃ manyase droṇa nedānīṃ no gururbhavān // Bhmj_7.429 //
GK19ksbhm07u:883: apakrānte kṣaṇaṃ droṇe sānujaṃ kauraveśvaram // Bhmj_7.431 //
GK19ksbhm07u:889: vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dromaḥ punarādravat // Bhmj_7.434 //
GK19ksbhm07u:911: bhajyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmena bhujaśālinā // Bhmj_7.445 //
GK19ksbhm07u:915: bhagne samiti rādheye dhaureye dhairyaśālinām // Bhmj_7.447 //
GK19ksbhm07u:917: arjunaste priyaḥ śiṣyastvāmullaṅghya gato yadi // Bhmj_7.448 //
GK19ksbhm07u:922: sainyaṃ puraśca paścācca gṛhītaṃ dhāryate katham /
GK19ksbhm07u:927: pārthasātyakibhīmānāṃ paryāptaḥ kiṃ na vāraṇe // Bhmj_7.453 //
GK19ksbhm07u:937: karṇo mānī samāśvasya rathena punarādravat // Bhmj_7.458 //
GK19ksbhm07u:941: jaghāna ghananirghoṣaṃ rathaṃ saha manorathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.460 //
GK19ksbhm07u:945: taṃ hatvā vinadanbhīmaḥ śaraiḥ karṇamapūrayat // Bhmj_7.462 //
GK19ksbhm07u:949: gurvī gadāṃ visṛjyāsya niṣpipeṣa rathaṃ javāt // Bhmj_7.464 //
GK19ksbhm07u:950: bhuvi sthitaṃ śarairbhinnaṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā suyodhanaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:964: hateṣu teṣu rādheyo dhunāno vipulaṃ dhanuḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:966: tasya bhīmo dhanuśchitvā rathaṃ ca guruvikramaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:971: upacitraḥ sacitraśca cārucitraśca te samam // Bhmj_7.475 //
GK19ksbhm07u:994: viṣamasthaṃ raṇe karṇo na jaghāna vṛkodaram /
GK19ksbhm07u:995: vīraḥ kuntīvacaḥ smṛtvā satyaśīlā hi sādhavaḥ // Bhmj_7.487 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1018: āste mahārathairgupto yatra pāpo jayadrathaḥ // Bhmj_7.498 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1024: siktā vīraraseneva diśaḥ pallavitā babhuḥ // Bhmj_7.501 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1032: garjitaṃ cakitāḥ sarve rājahaṃsā na sehire // Bhmj_7.505 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1035: chitvā parasparaṃ cāpaṃ syandanaṃ saṃpramathya ca /
GK19ksbhm07u:1036: khaṅgacarmadharau vīrau yuyudhāte cirāya tau // Bhmj_7.507 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1038: tayoḥ sthagitasaṃgrāmā vīrāḥ prekṣakatāṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_7.508 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1042: uvāca sahasā pārthaṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ kaiṭabhāntakaḥ // Bhmj_7.510 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1044: paśya śatruvaśaṃ yātaṃ śrāntaṃ sātyakimāhave // Bhmj_7.511 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1046: yadimāṃ sātyakirapi prāptaḥ klībocitāṃ daśām // Bhmj_7.512 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1048: samudyataḥ śiro hartuṃ śiṣyasya tava sātyakeḥ // Bhmj_7.513 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1059: aho vīravrataṃ pārtha kīdṛśaṃ darśinaṃ tvayā /
GK19ksbhm07u:1060: yenānyaraṇasaktasya cchadmanā me hato bhujaḥ // Bhmj_7.519 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1068: vihvalo viṣamātmā ca rakṣitaḥ sātyakirmayā // Bhmj_7.523 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1069: hantā śiṣyasya sakhyuśca kṛttahastaḥ kṛto yadi /
GK19ksbhm07u:1070: tatra kiṃ nāma manyadhvaṃ nirdeṣā yūyamāhave // Bhmj_7.524 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1074: yayāce praṇataḥ pūrvaṃ raṇaṃ prāyajuṣo ripoḥ // Bhmj_7.526 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1080: saumadatteśca caritaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ surā divi // Bhmj_7.529 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1083: ārādhya tapasā devaṃ rūdraṃ tripuradāraṇam // Bhmj_7.530 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1087: tūrṇaṃ viveśa śvetāśvo nibiḍaṃ rājamaṇḍalam // Bhmj_7.532 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1089: dadarśa saindhavaṃ pārtho guptaṃ sarvairmahārathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.533 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1093: hato hataḥ sindhurājo babhūveti mahāsvanaḥ // Bhmj_7.535 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1101: chindhi sindhupateḥ kṣipraṃ śiro divyena patriṇā // Bhmj_7.539 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1105: tadaṅke pātaya ripoḥ sirastasmātprayātu gām // Bhmj_7.541 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1109: vṛddhakṣattrasya sahasā papātāgre nijaṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_7.543 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1115: bhīmo nanarda taṃ nādaṃ hataṃ matvā jayadratham /
GK19ksbhm07u:1117: akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta hatvā hataḥ pārthena saindhavaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1118: nūnaṃ na durgaṃ daivasya kiṃcidityūcire janāḥ // Bhmj_7.547 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1120: droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ ca vidadhe śarairjiṣṇuḥ parāṅmukham // Bhmj_7.548 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1123: āruroha rathaṃ vīro vitīrṇa hariṇā nijam // Bhmj_7.549 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1125: punaḥ pratijñāṃ karṇasya vṛṣasenavadhe vyadhāt // Bhmj_7.550 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1126: tato yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prāpya tau ca sātyakiphalguṇau /
GK19ksbhm07u:1129: tuṣṭāva jagatāṃ nāthaṃ viṣṇuṃ vijayakāraṇam // Bhmj_7.552 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1131: ūce tvayā kṛtāśvāso nihataḥ sa jayadrathaḥ // Bhmj_7.553 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1133: tyakṣyāmi kavacaṃ rājannāhatvā tava vairiṇaḥ // Bhmj_7.554 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1139: hatānāṃ bhūbhunāṃ jīvairiva vyāpte nabhastale // Bhmj_7.557 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1143: cakrire samaraṃ ghoraṃ duryodhanamukhāḥ paraiḥ // Bhmj_7.559 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1149: prāpustamāṃsi dāridryaṃ chattreṣu vyajaneṣu ca // Bhmj_7.562 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1163: dhruvaṃ ca jaladhāraṃ ca rājaputrāvadārayat // Bhmj_7.569 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1165: niṣpipeṣa padā hatvā vīro duṣkaradurmadaḥ // Bhmj_7.570 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1167: taṃ putraśokavidhuraṃ cakāra vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_7.571 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1177: na kūṇitāni netrāṇi rātrau bhūtāni sehire // Bhmj_7.576 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1182: tato vimohanīṃ māyāṃ drauṇiḥ kruddhasya rakṣasaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1185: jaghāna rājaputrāṇāṃ drauṇiḥ kāla ivākulaḥ // Bhmj_7.580 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1197: mṛdyamānāṃ camūṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇamūce suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_7.586 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1199: virāvaṃ vadhyamānānāṃ sainyānāṃ ca tarasvinām // Bhmj_7.587 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1210: aho nu mithyā rādheya kathitena tāvamunā /
GK19ksbhm07u:1213: yadā hataḥ sindhupatiḥ kṛtavānna bhavāṃstadā // Bhmj_7.594 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1214: dṛṣṭasārā vayaṃ sarve tava pāṇḍusutasya ca /
GK19ksbhm07u:1215: balānusāraṃ yudhyasva vṛthā ślāghāṃ tu mā kṛtāḥ // Bhmj_7.595 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1217: garjanti saphalaṃ vīrāḥ prāvṛṣeṇyā ivāmbudāḥ // Bhmj_7.596 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1218: tvaṃ tu vṛddha nirācāro mohādevaṃ prabhāṣase /
GK19ksbhm07u:1221: chetasyāmi jihvāṃ kaṭukāṃ tadanenāsinā tava // Bhmj_7.598 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1237: pāñcālā droṇaputreṇa hataśeṣā diśo yayuḥ // Bhmj_7.606 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1238: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato jitvā vīraṃ hatvāsya cānugān /
GK19ksbhm07u:1249: sainyānāṃ bhajyamānānāṃ babhūva bhayado ravaḥ // Bhmj_7.612 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1261: svayaṃ jite dharmajena sānuge kauraveśvare // Bhmj_7.618 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1263: na jaghāna raṇe karṇaḥ smarankuntīvaco muhuḥ // Bhmj_7.619 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1274: taṃ karṇaṃ sāyakānena kirantaṃ tejasāṃ nidhim /
GK19ksbhm07u:1275: na sehire pare draṣṭuṃ raṇe tapanasaṃbhavam // Bhmj_7.625 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1277: jayāśā pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ sakalā tanutāṃ yayau // Bhmj_7.626 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1281: vāhinyaḥ śatadhā jagmuḥ pratāpapatitā iva // Bhmj_7.628 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1291: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikaṭājvālaṃ pāṭitānāṃ vyathāravaḥ // Bhmj_7.633 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1304: tato bhuvi viniṣpiṣya rāviṇaṃ taṃ ghaṭotkacaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1307: priyasya pātaya śiraḥ punareva nṛpādham // Bhmj_7.641 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1314: viddho 'pi rakṣasā karṇo na cacāla mahāśayaḥ // Bhmj_7.644 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1323: muhurgajo muhuḥ siṃhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ meghaḥ kṣaṇaṃ giriḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1325: bhuvo vahniṃ divaḥ śastraṃ digbhyo rākṣasamaṇḍalam /
GK19ksbhm07u:1327: tato vidhūya tāṃ māyāṃ karṇo divyāstratejasā /
GK19ksbhm07u:1330: karṇo dhanuṣmatāṃ dhuryo vibabhau rāmavikramaḥ // Bhmj_7.652 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1332: bhaimaḥ sasarja karṇāya svayaṃ rudreṇa nirmitām // Bhmj_7.653 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1342: yukte śatena gambhīranirghoṣe syāndane sthitam // Bhmj_7.658 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1347: tāṃ gadāṃ gadayā rakṣo hatvā jāmbūnadāṅgadām /
GK19ksbhm07u:1350: bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃdehākulito 'bhavat // Bhmj_7.662 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1371: niṣkampaḥ samare karṇaḥ sāyakaiḥ khamapūrayat // Bhmj_7.672 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1385: asminniśīthe ko hyasmānmucyate yaḥ punarjayet // Bhmj_7.679 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1390: tejasvino rākṣasasya dṛḍhaṃ vakṣo vidārya sā /
GK19ksbhm07u:1408: evameva raṇe karṇo na jeyastridaśairapi // Bhmj_7.690 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1411: karṇa pratiniśaṃ pāpaiḥ preryamāṇo 'pi kauravaiḥ // Bhmj_7.691 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1421: dharmavīra tjaja krodhaṃ sadā dharmānugo jayaḥ // Bhmj_7.696 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1427: dṛṣṭvā jagāda kāruṇyācchvetāśvo yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_7.699 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1439: cāmarairiva bhūpālā vījyamānāḥ kṣaṇaṃ babhuḥ // Bhmj_7.705 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1441: hareṣu phullito rājñāṃ śaṅkheṣu phalito 'bhavat // Bhmj_7.706 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1454: na śarma lebhire vīrāḥ pīḍitā droṇasāyakaiḥ // Bhmj_7.712 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1456: saṃcchādya cakratuḥ kṣipraṃ vismayaṃ tava dhanvinām // Bhmj_7.713 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1469: divyāstraduḥsahaśikhaḥ soḍhuṃ naḥ kena pāryate // Bhmj_7.719 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1471: udyataḥ kartumadyaiva jāne niṣpāṇḍavaṃ jagat // Bhmj_7.720 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1472: putraṃ tu nihataṃ śrutvā dhruvameṣa na yotsyate /
GK19ksbhm07u:1479: durjayaṃ tanayaṃ matvā droṇo mene na tattathā // Bhmj_7.724 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1488: munisaṃghe gate vyomnā droṇo bhīmavacaḥ smaran /
GK19ksbhm07u:1497: aho tanu brāhmaṇo bhūtvā piśitāśīva niṣkṛpaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1498: karoṣi kaluṣaṃ karma nihate 'pi priye sute // Bhmj_7.733 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1499: tacchrutvā sahasā droṇastyaktvā cāpaṃ saha krudhā /
GK19ksbhm07u:1500: dattvā sarvābhayaṃ maunī dadarśa jyotirāntaram // Bhmj_7.734 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1506: śiro jahāra khaḍgena dhikkṛtaḥ sravarājabhiḥ // Bhmj_7.737 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1509: saṃbhrāntā dudruvuḥ sarve kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ // Bhmj_7.738 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1514: śrutvā sa vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ chadmanā vihitaṃ gurau /
GK19ksbhm07u:1521: mayi jīvati kaunteyaḥ kathaṃ prāpsyati medinīm // Bhmj_7.744 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1528: ityuktvā saṃdadhe dhīptaṃ tadastraṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1531: drauṇiryena diśaḥ sarvā yayuḥ śakalatāmiva // Bhmj_7.749 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1538: ghorāpakāre kaḥ śatrau raṇe nyāyamupekṣate // Bhmj_7.752 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1540: tvayi kṛṣṇe ca kiṃ nāma drauṇiślāghābhinandyate // Bhmj_7.753 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1545: tvayā hataḥ kathaṃ bhīṣmaḥ sa ca prāgjyotiṣeśvaraḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1546: pituḥ sakhā kimetena gahanā vīravṛttayaḥ // Bhmj_7.756 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1551: bata pāpa vayaṃ sarve ye gurughnaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
GK19ksbhm07u:1554: aho nu paradoṣajño nirdeṣa iva bhāṣase // Bhmj_7.760 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1566: ghore subhaṭasaṃhāre trasto rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // Bhmj_7.766 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1572: durbhedyaṃ kavacaṃ prādāddivyaṃ duryodhanāya yaḥ // Bhmj_7.769 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1573: kriyatāṃ nādhunā yuddhaṃ svasti pārthāya dhīmate /
GK19ksbhm07u:1574: evaṃ vahniṃ pravekṣyāmi drauṇiṃ kālaṃ saheta kaḥ // Bhmj_7.770 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1577: bho bhoḥ śastraṃ parityajya rathebhyo vrajata kṣitim /
GK19ksbhm07u:1578: astreṇānena hanyante na viśastrā bhuvi sthitāḥ // Bhmj_7.772 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1594: avaruhya rathātkṛṣṇau drāgbhujābhyāṃ vikṛṣya tam // Bhmj_7.780 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1596: vīrau citrojjvalau hṛṣṭau tasthātuḥ kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau // Bhmj_7.781 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1597: astre tataḥ svayaṃ śānte prasanne bhuvanatraye /
GK19ksbhm07u:1598: ūce duryodhano drauṇiṃ punarastraṃ prayujyatām // Bhmj_7.782 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1601: sa sātyakiṃ pārṣataṃ ca jitvā vidrāvya vāhinīm /
GK19ksbhm07u:1602: jaghāna pauravaṃ vīraṃ rājānaṃ ca sudarśanam // Bhmj_7.784 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1615: rathaṃ samutsṛjya tamugrakarmā praṇamya papraccha gurostanūjaḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1616: astrāṇi divyānyaphalāni kasmātpārthe sakṛṣṇe bhagavangatāni // Bhmj_7.791 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1621: sa eṣa durjayaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ svayaṃ liṅgārcanavrataḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1622: drauṇe tvamapi rudrāṃśastasmānmā vikriyāṃ gamaḥ // Bhmj_7.794 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1624: dhiyā rudraṃ namaskṛtya devau kṛṣṇāvamanyata // Bhmj_7.795 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1626: nivṛttaḥ samarātpārthaḥ pathi vyāsaṃ vyalokayat // Bhmj_7.796 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1628: dṛṣṭo mayā śūlahastaḥ puruṣo dahanadyutiḥ // Bhmj_7.797 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1630: kurusenā mayā dṛṣṭā dahyamānā samantataḥ // Bhmj_7.798 //
GK19ksbhm07u:1635: yaṃ namaskṛtya varadaṃ rājante divi devatāḥ /
GK19ksbhm07u:1637: smaraharamasurāriṃ taṃ smara smerakāntiṃ haramajaramajayyaṃ śāśvataṃ viśvarūpam /
GK19ksbhm07u:1642: bhūpāḥ praviśya śibirāṇi dināvasāne cakruḥ kathāḥ pravaravīrakathānubaddhāḥ // Bhmj_7.804 //
